answers.answer: Well, could be a lot of things, but the easiest explanations are that she is tired and overworked and so she's just getting confused, or she's "taking things wrong" because she feels defensive on account of low self-esteem, or maybe her hearing needs checking which is quite common, or she may be in pain from say an old injury that has flared up and so she's not concentrating very well, or might be she's not eating as well as she should becuz getting low on some vitamins and minerals will cause the brain to work less efficiently.On the darker side, she may be getting depressed or she may have a glitch in thinking, or could be her blood sugars might indicate diabetes, all sorts of things.  So, she needs to have a good physical checkup by her family doc or be seen at the county health clinic, go with her so you can speak to the physician, and they OUGHT to be able to figure out what specialist she should visit for her health issues.  By the way, sometimes people are on medication and they don't tell anybody, so that might have side effects that are causing this.  Let us know how things go.
